title: Isei no Shimai
synopsis: 3D VR animation about a man who is abducted by aliens. The aliens are conquering the world and they want to split the countries 50-50 by rolling a die and choosing the countries they want. They take his phone and look through his apps, including a dating profile and messages to his wife. They find out that he's cheating and outs him to his wife. He grabs the alien and breaks free, then announces that he himself wants to take over the world now and that all the countries should be re-divided to the three of them.
